verses.verse: Open <S%H6605><s%> your doors, <S%H1817><s%> Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> that the fire <S%H784><s%> may devour <S%H398><s%> your cedars. <S%H730><s%>

Wail, <S%H3213><s%> fir tree, <S%H1265><s%> for the cedar <S%H730><s%> has fallen, <S%H5307><s%> because the stately <S%H117><s%> ones are destroyed. <S%H7703><s%> Wail, <S%H3213><s%> you oaks <S%H437><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> for the strong <S%H1208><s%> forest <S%H3293><s%> has come down. <S%H3381><s%>

A voice <S%H6963><s%> of the wailing <S%H3215><s%> of the shepherds! <S%H7462><s%> For their glory <S%H155><s%> is destroyed: <S%H7703><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> of the roaring <S%H7581><s%> of young lions! <S%H3715><s%> For the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> is ruined. <S%H7703><s%>
Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God: <S%H430><s%> "Feed <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of slaughter. <S%H2028><s%>

Their buyers <S%H7069><s%> slaughter <S%H2026><s%> them, <S%H816><s%> and go unpunished. Those who sell <S%H4376><s%> them say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H1288><s%> 'Blessed be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> for I am rich; <S%H6238><s%>' and their own shepherds <S%H7462><s%> don't <S%H2550><s%> pity them.

For I will no more pity <S%H2550><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> "but, <S%H4672><s%> behold, I will deliver the men <S%H120><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> into his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s hand, <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his king. <S%H4428><s%> They will strike <S%H3807><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and out of their hand <S%H3027><s%> I will not deliver them. <S%H5337><s%>"

So I fed <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of slaughter, <S%H2028><s%> especially <S%H3651><s%> the oppressed <S%H6041><s%> of the flock. <S%H6629><s%> I took <S%H3947><s%> for myself two <S%H8147><s%> staffs. <S%H4731><s%> The one <S%H259><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> "Favor, <S%H5278><s%>" and the other <S%H259><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> "Union, <S%H2254><s%>" and I fed <S%H7462><s%> the flock. <S%H6629><s%>

I cut off <S%H3582><s%> the three <S%H7969><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> month; <S%H3391><s%> for my soul <S%H5315><s%> was weary <S%H7114><s%> of them, <S%H5315><s%> and their soul also loathed me. <S%H973><s%>

Then I said, <S%H559><s%> "I will not feed <S%H7462><s%> you. <S%H4191><s%> That which dies, let it die; <S%H4191><s%> and that which is to be cut off, <S%H3582><s%> let it be cut off; <S%H3582><s%> and let those who are left <S%H7604><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> each <S%H802><s%> other <S%H7468><s%>'s flesh. <S%H1320><s%>"

I took <S%H3947><s%> my staff <S%H4731><s%> Favor, <S%H5278><s%> and cut it apart, <S%H1438><s%> that I might break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> that I had made <S%H3772><s%> with all the peoples. <S%H5971><s%>

It was broken <S%H6565><s%> in that day; <S%H3117><s%> and thus the poor <S%H6041><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> that listened <S%H8104><s%> to me knew <S%H3045><s%> that it was the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H5869><s%> "If you think it best, <S%H3051><s%> give me my wages; <S%H7939><s%> and if not, <S%H2308><s%> keep them. <S%H8254><s%>" So they weighed for my wages <S%H7939><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> pieces of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7993><s%> "Throw it to the potter, <S%H3335><s%> the handsome <S%H145><s%> price <S%H3366><s%> that I was valued at <S%H3365><s%> by them! <S%H3947><s%>" I took the thirty <S%H7970><s%> pieces of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and threw <S%H7993><s%> them to the potter, <S%H3335><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Then I cut apart <S%H1438><s%> my other <S%H8145><s%> staff, <S%H4731><s%> even Union, <S%H2254><s%> that I might break <S%H6565><s%> the brotherhood <S%H264><s%> between Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H3947><s%> "Take for yourself yet again the equipment <S%H3627><s%> of a foolish <S%H196><s%> shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

For, <S%H6965><s%> behold, I will raise up a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> who will not visit <S%H6485><s%> those who are cut off, <S%H3582><s%> neither will seek <S%H1245><s%> those who are scattered, <S%H5289><s%> nor heal <S%H7495><s%> that which is broken, <S%H7665><s%> nor feed <S%H3557><s%> that which is sound; <S%H5324><s%> but he will eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the fat <S%H1277><s%> sheep, <S%H6561><s%> and will tear their hoofs <S%H6541><s%> in pieces. <S%H6561><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the worthless <S%H457><s%> shepherd <S%H7473><s%> who leaves <S%H5800><s%> the flock! <S%H6629><s%> The sword <S%H2719><s%> will be on his arm, <S%H2220><s%> and on his right <S%H3225><s%> eye. <S%H5869><s%> His arm <S%H2220><s%> will be completely <S%H3001><s%> withered, <S%H3001><s%> and his right <S%H3225><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> will be totally <S%H3543><s%> blinded! <S%H3543><s%>"
